title: Förrädarna
overview: Actor Dragomir Mrsic leads the program where board games meet reality. Get ready for a nerve-wracking murder mystery game where we, the viewers, become witnesses behind the scenes. 18 participants, completely unaware of each other, arrive at Häringe Castle and are put to tough tests in the psychological game. Who in the group can be trusted, which blacksmiths cheat and above all who are the Traitors?
